personalInformation.loginPrompt: Please log in to view your personal information.

intermediate.loginProcess: Please wait while we complete your login process.

confirmationModal.confirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to purchase the items in your cart?

thanks.appreciation: We appreciate your business. Your order will be processed and shipped as soon as possible.

home.headline: Dexxos Market: Your Trusted Supermarket
home.subheadline: Find a wide variety of fresh and quality products in our stores. Enjoy exceptional service and competitive prices.
home.deliveryDescription: Enjoy the convenience of having your purchases delivered to your home. Our home delivery service is fast and reliable.
home.pickupDescription: If you prefer, you can pick up your purchases at any of our stores. Quick and no lines!
home.rewardsDescription: Join our rewards program and enjoy exclusive discounts, special offers, and more.

login.signInToContinue: Sign in to your account to continue.
